unnormalised: ## Bollywood's Spicier Than Maa's Biryani: This Week's Celebrity Gossip Roundup!
normalised: ## Bollywood's Spicier Than Maa's Biryani: This Week's Celebrity Gossip Roundup!

unnormalised: Namaste, folks! Buckle up, because this week's celebrity gossip is hotter than the Chennai sun in May! Forget your chai, this is the real masala.
normalised: Namaste, folks! Buckle up, because this week's celebrity gossip is hotter than the Chennai sun in May! Forget your chai, this is the real masala.

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling faster than a dhol during Diwali about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt. Apparently, their "couple's retreat" to the Maldives wasn't just for sunshine and selfies. Sources (read: that chaiwala outside Dharma Productions) claim they were scouting locations for a future movie! Or, you know, maybe they just wanted some peace from Neetu Kapoor's well-meaning, but constant, matchmaking attempts for their daughter, Raha. One can only imagine the pressure!
normalised: First up, whispers are swirling faster than a dhol during Diwali about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt. Apparently, their "couple's retreat" to the Maldives wasn't just for sunshine and selfies. Sources (read: that chaiwala outside Dharma Productions) claim they were scouting locations for a future movie! Or, you know, maybe they just wanted some peace from Neetu Kapoor's well-meaning, but constant, matchmaking attempts for their daughter, Raha. One can only imagine the pressure!

unnormalised: Then there's the saga of Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh. Remember that viral video of Ranveer devouring golgappas at a Mumbai chaat stall? Turns out, Deepika wasn't just amused. Apparently, she was secretly filming it for his birthday reel! Sources close to the couple revealed she made him sign a contract promising her 50% of the views' revenue for the effort. Talk about business acumen! It's more cutthroat than a Delhi auction.
normalised: Then there's the saga of Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh. Remember that viral video of Ranveer devouring golgappas at a Mumbai chaat stall? Turns out, Deepika wasn't just amused. Apparently, she was secretly filming it for his birthday reel! Sources close to the couple revealed she made him sign a contract promising her fifty percent of the views' revenue for the effort. Talk about business acumen! It's more cutthroat than a Delhi auction.

unnormalised: And finally, our favorite controversy magnet, Rakhi Sawant, has declared she's "taking a break from love" to focus on opening a "Rakhi Sawant Acting Academy" in Bandra. Apparently, the fees will include a mandatory "drama queen" certification and a class on "how to cry on national television for maximum sympathy." Admission forms are already being sold outside Gaiety Galaxy theatre! They cost Rs. 500 and come with a free samosa (while supplies last).
normalised: And finally, our favorite controversy magnet, Rakhi Sawant, has declared she's "taking a break from love" to focus on opening a "Rakhi Sawant Acting Academy" in Bandra. Apparently, the fees will include a mandatory "drama queen" certification and a class on "how to cry on national television for maximum sympathy." Admission forms are already being sold outside Gaiety Galaxy theatre! They cost rupees five hundred and come with a free samosa (while supplies last).

unnormalised: Speaking of festivals, rumor has it that Katrina Kaif is planning a grand Onam sadhya for Vicky Kaushal's family next year. Apparently, she's been taking secret cooking lessons from her mother-in-law, Veena Kaushal. Watch out, MasterChef India! Katrina's about to bring the heat!
normalised: Speaking of festivals, rumor has it that Katrina Kaif is planning a grand Onam sadhya for Vicky Kaushal's family next year. Apparently, she's been taking secret cooking lessons from her mother-in-law, Veena Kaushal. Watch out, MasterChef India! Katrina's about to bring the heat!

unnormalised: That's all for this week's dose of delicious (and possibly fabricated) gossip. Remember, take everything with a pinch of salt (and maybe a side of biryani). Until next time, keep your eyes peeled and your ears to the ground, because in Bollywood, anything is possible! Especially if Rakhi Sawant is involved.
